RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROLLIN ALL THE WAY forwardly placed near the inside, shifted out three wide at the top of the stretch, responded under left handed urging to make the lead past the furlong marker, shook clear and won under strong handling. LADY ABRIL checked along the inside just past the five eighths pole, saved ground through the turn, shifted out to the six path entering the stretch and was steadily cutting into the winners' advantage late. APPEALING SENORITA pressed the pace three wide into the turn, made the lead nearing the quarter pole, kept a narrow lead past the furlong marker then was outfinished. STAR MABEE broke in front, set the pace along the inside into the turn, kept momentum until deep stretch then gave way. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE was taken outside soon after the start, had good early speed four wide then faded. CARMEN OHIO was no factor. DOUBLE EDGED rushed to contention between horses two wide, had speed through the turn then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Abril
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked inside 5/8pole, saved ground, swung wide, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Carmen Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Royer Family Stables LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Star Mabee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Double Edged
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed 2w, speed turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken outside start, close up 4 wide, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Rollin All the Way
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Trusso Tony
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, shifted 3w, 3/16pole, surged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Appealing Senorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, led, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE SEPTEMBER 26, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDY CRUSHEM away alertly, opened a daylight lead on the first turn, was put to pressure before a half, turned back that rival on the far turn, was challenged again by the runner up nearing the furlong marker, dug in gamely under right handed urging late and proved best. LAZARUS PROJECT had good position, loomed boldly outside the winner two wide into the stretch and was denied. ITASCA allowed to settle, moved up three wide on the far turn then leveled off. GEH SCHNELL trailed into the stretch then passed tiring rivals in the six path. ONLYATTHESHOE failed to menace. EXALTED JOY well placed, failed to respond. KOSCIUSZKO checked along the rail when in right entering the first turn, went up to pressure the winner two wide before a half, remained a sharp threat into the stretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Kosciuszko
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked rail 7/8pole, loomed 2 wide backstretch, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Candy Crushem
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, repulsed multiple bids, gamely,

ENTRY.NAME: Exalted Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Itasca
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position, loomed boldly 2 wide upper stretch, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Geh Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Onlyattheshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 104. Allowance Purse 32500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowan ces) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEER CHASER broke well, set all the pace while getting rapid fractions, drifted to the six path through the stretch under right handed urging and drew clear late. BUCK MOON was bumped at the start, never far back, offered a mild bid two wide on the far turn outside the winner and held on for second. STAR HAWK settled near the inside into the stretch, swung outside and finished with good courage in the middle of the racetrack. STATESBORO was bumped at the start, chased the winner early and was through after a half. HUNTER SCOTT drifted out bumping BUCK MOOON into STATESBORO at the start, checked between rivals leaving the clubhouse turn, dropped back then had no rally. STRIKE APPEAL was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Beer Chaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set fast pace, drifted 6path, held well

ENTRY.NAME: Star Hawk
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position, finished well outside

ENTRY.NAME: Hunter Scott
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, bumped start, checked 3/4pole, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Buck Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, never far back, middle move, 2 wide, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Statesboro
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Strike Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRONCLAD ALIBI stalked the pace into the stretch, swung wide, closed willingly in the seven path through deep stretch under strong handling and got up in the final strides. WHO DA BOSS pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, made the lead, set the balance of the pace then couldn't handle the winner. ROMANIAN PRINCE was forced inward at the start, set the pace along the inside into the stretch, drifted to the five path and was outfinished. GRAY TORMENTOR drifted inward at the start and failed to menace. RAMBLER had speed along the inside into the turn then wilted. SKIPTHEGUILTTRIP was in tight at the start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Rambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Ironclad Alibi
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, closed willingly, 3 wide 7path, up in final stride

ENTRY.NAME: Skiptheguilttrip
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Romanian Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced in start, pace upper stretch, drifted 5path, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Gray Tormentor
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted inward start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Who Da Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 41500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For$12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I RECALL never far back, rallied along the inside to make the lead midway on the far turn, drifted to the five path entering the stretch, drew off and won in hand. MARKET SUCCESS with the second flight two wide, shifted outside rivals four wide near the quarter pole, rallied determinedly and finished clear for second. SONNET away alertly, set the pace into the far turn then was outfinished. R THREE ANGELS pressed the pace two then three wide into the stretch and was also outfinished. SHE'S CRAFTY was no factor. JETTIN PEGASUS was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Jettin Pegasus
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: I Recall
ENTRY.OWNER: Allen, Lowell F. and Bourke, W. John
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, rallied inside 2nd turn, drew off, handily,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Lowell F. Allen & W. John Bourke

ENTRY.NAME: Sonnet
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2nd turn, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: R Three Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2-3wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: She's Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Market Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight 2 wide, altered course 4 wide, clear second

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 89. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 26 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since July 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZERO GRAVITY trailed for nearly a half, closed willingly three wide through the far turn to make the lead in upper stretch and drew off under right handed urging. MY BROTHER CAM stalked the early pace, loomed boldly three wide before a half, prompted the pace two wide, gained a slight lead briefly at the top of the stretch then was was no match for winner. ROYAL DRAGOON trailed into the stretch and passed tiring rivals late in the five path. PATIO PARTY set the pace along the inside for six furlongs then drifted out from the two path to the four path late while tiring. TOE TAPPIN LUKE pressed the pace two wide into the far turn, began to fade and was shut off late causing his rider to check. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF TOE TAPPIN LUKE LODGED CLAIMS OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDERS OF PATIO PARTY AND ROYAL DRAGOON FOR INTEFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED PATIO PARTY AND PLACED HIM FIFTH.

ENTRY.NAME: My Brother Cam
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Toe Tappin Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, shut off late, checked, jockey claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Patio Party
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, drifted out late, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Zero Gravity
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, closed willingly, 3 wide, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Dragoon
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, passed tiring rivals 5path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 55. Claiming Purse 17900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 26 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7 ,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HITCH CITY sprinted up the inside to make the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while in hand. CHILLVILLE was hustled along to chased the winner and finished clear for second. ARTIES CRYPTONITE unhurried early, swung wide and had a mild late rally in the seven path. SWEET CHELSEA void of early speed, found her best stride late along the rail. HOSANNA was a forward factor four wide and through after a half. WAR MOON had brief speed three wide. DISCREET ENERGY was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Hitch City
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, much the best, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Arties Cryptonite
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, mild rally late 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Chillville
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, chased, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: War Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed, 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Hosanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 4 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Chelsea
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, best stride late inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Discreet Energy
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 29700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 26 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since July 26 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weig ht Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INSOLITO broke in full stride to set all the pace, drifted out through the stretch to the six path under right handed urging and prevailed. CITY OF CLOUDS chased the winner, inched closer outside three wide into the stretch, angled inside that one in deep stretch and finished clear for second. BUCKEYE SKY stalked the pace into the stretch, drifted wide giving up ground and finished evenly. GOING IN STYLE offered a mild bid along the inside through the turn then came up empty. R CARDINAL PRINCE failed to menace. LAND REMEMBERED was outrun. LUCKY NINETEEN had brief speed. THE RIDER OF CITY OF CLOUDS LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTEFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: City of Clouds
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inched closer outside 3wide, angled in late, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Nineteen
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: Going in Style
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, inside, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Insolito
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, drifted out, right urging, driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Tom Evans, Marjac Farms & Ted Forrest MD

ENTRY.NAME: Land Remembered
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: R Cardinal Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drifted wide, evenly,
